text:
Fabian Nürnberger (born 28 July 1999) is a German professional footballer who plays as a defender for 1. FC Nürnberg.
Nürnberger was born in Hamburg. Following the season, Nürnberger received his first professional contract in May 2019, which is valid until 2021.
On 13 March 2020, 1. FC Nürnberg announced that Nürnberger had tested positive for COVID-19.
